input_text:
Job Title: Maintenance Tech II - 1st Shift

Location: Olive Branch, MS

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Description

INNOVATE without boundaries! At Milwaukee Tool we firmly believe our People and our Culture are the secrets to our success. One of our critical teams is the Maintenance team at our Olive Branch Distribution Center. Every day, this team is on the front lines making sure our facilities and employees receive the support needed to get the right products at the right time to our customers. As part of this team, you'll help create and maintain a safe and productive environment that ensure the successes that our employees and customers.

We are an inclusive workplace that encourages diversity of thought, experience, and background to solve complex problems as one team. Every employee is encouraged to continuously improve and grow, and it is a top priority for managers and supervisors to develop their teams, making a wide range of internal development opportunities available to all employees. We are One Team, overcoming obstacles together and celebrating together. Come be part of a winning team that feels like family.

To learn more about our story click HERE.

Team Member Benefits

Comprehensive benefits including medical, dental, and vision insurance along with a 401(K) program, a wellness program, fitness center, PTO, and much more.Access to a free on-site wellness clinic for all full-time employees and their dependents who are enrolled in our healthcare plan.Career advancement opportunities.

You’ll Be DISRUPTIVE Through These Duties And Responsibilities

Coordinate maintenance for the Milwaukee Tool Olive Branch Distribution Center.Track and perform preventive maintenance on production machinery such as conveyors, forklifts, stretch wrappers, tape machines, etc.Troubleshoot and repair distribution/production machinery safely and quickly when failures occur.Provide support for all departments in the distribution center to help keep each area productive.Order parts and supplies needed to maintain all equipment and inventory.Perform building repairs and other duties as required such as light plumbing, painting, running occasional maintenance related errands, and contact contracted labor for facilities up-keep.Develop and maintain complete P.M. schedule on all equipment.Provide training and instruction to facilities technicians.Maintain 5S techniques in the shop and work areas.Aid with cleaning and custodial duties.Perform other duties as assigned.

The TOOLS You’ll Bring With You

Requires education equivalent to four years of high school.4-8 years of professional work experience in a production environment.Results-focused, takes ownership of team success.Exceptional communication skills, both written and verbal.Able to problem-solve quickly and execute solutions effectively.Requires development mindset and always willing to learn and be coached.

Physical And Weightlifting Demands

Frequent bending, stooping, pushing, and pulling of tools and boxes.Standing for long periods of time, as well as repetitive motion.Operate manual pallet jacks (Operation of other equipment is a plus!).Able to work in various temperature conditions.Ability to lift and/or move objects up to 70lbs.

The physical and weightlifting demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Maintenance Tech II - 1st Shift
output_json.summary: Maintenance team at Olive Branch Distribution Center ensuring facilities and employees receive support.
job_responsibilities: Coordinate maintenance for the Milwaukee Tool Olive Branch Distribution Center
Track and perform preventive maintenance on production machinery
Aid with cleaning and custodial duties
output_json.physical_requirements: Frequent bending, stooping, pushing, and pulling. Standing for long periods. Repetitive motion. Ability to lift up to 70lbs.
